config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'skipUpscaling' is a boolean option that determines whether to skip upscaling of images during the image processing. If the option is enabled (true), the system will skip the upscaling process, otherwise it will perform upscaling as configured.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'skipUpscaling' configuration depends on the user's choice when running the image processing tool. If the user chooses to skip upscaling, the configuration will be triggered every time the tool processes images. If the user does not skip upscaling, the configuration will not be triggered.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'skipUpscaling' configuration option on the system is that it can affect the quality and size of the processed images. Skipping upscaling may result in lower quality images with smaller file sizes, while not skipping upscaling may lead to higher quality images with larger file sizes.
